title.bibl: St. Constantine Parish News, Nov. 12, 1933. Koraes School Has Haloween Party

div.bibl: St. Constantine's Parish News, Nov. 12, 1933. KORAES SCHOOL HAS HALOWEEN PARTY

body.p: The pupils of Koraes Greek-American School held their annual Halloween Party, Tuesday, October 30. Costumes were worn by some of the youngsters. The after noon was spent in playing games and eating! (Um--- can those kids eat!) All agreed that they had a grand time.
Much credit is due to the teachers of the school who labored greatly to make this party a huge success.
